text: I love this quote from The Counselor. "They don't really believe in coincidences. They've heard of them. They've just never seen one." He's talking about the mob, and how they don't listen to excuses. If you owe them money you pay them or they kill you. But it's clever the way it was written. I think we need more of that in how we judge malfeasance by Trumpers. Stop being so fucking patient. Trump stole the documents because he has customers for them. That's all he cares about. Stop defending him. These aren't coincidences.
